body_html:
Here is the code where I feed an image to the classifier (f is the File of the current image to be fed)

BitmapFactory.Options options = new BitmapFactory.Options()
options.inSampleSize = 8;
final Bitmap b = BitmapFactory.decodeFile(f.getAbsolutePath(), options);
ArrayList<TFLiteRecognition> res = new ArrayList<>();
try {
    res = Globals.lightClassifier.classifyFrame(b);
} catch (IllegalStateException e) {
    Log.d(TAG, "testImage: " + e.getMessage());
}
